name: Astro's Discovery
description:
Story: Astro, rudely awoken on his ship from colliding space debris. To a surprise his artefacts from his journeys have been lost, maybe they would of fallen to some of the nearby planets? Why not have a look?

Brief: Astro's Discovery is a Platforming Puzzle game which was going to include the player traveling to different planets to collect artefacts which provide the player with more problem solving tools.

Astro's Discovery is a submission for a solar system & artefact jam which was conducted from the 5/7/21 - 8/7/21, The development on hasn't gone as expected due to time restraints however many of the maps/ideas had to be restricted to a demo scale in order to demonstrate the players abilities so most of the original idea is still in tact.

Please Enjoy!

Hold Escape to Quit
